style.use('fivethirtyeight')

source.c15fe204:
!pip install pycountry_convert
import pycountry_convert as pc
source.68a0b39c:
df2 = world.set_index('Country name')
temp = pd.DataFrame(df2['Ladder score']).reset_index()

#ADAPTING TO THE ISO 3166 STANDARD
temp.loc[temp['Country name'] == 'Taiwan Province of China', 'Country name'] = 'Taiwan, Province of China' 
temp.loc[temp['Country name'] == 'Hong Kong S.A.R. of China', 'Country name'] = 'Hong Kong' 
temp.loc[temp['Country name'] == 'Congo (Brazzaville)','Country name'] = 'Congo' 
temp.loc[temp['Country name'] == 'Palestinian Territories','Country name'] = 'Palestine, State of' 

temp.drop(index=temp[temp['Country name'] == 'Kosovo'].index, inplace=True) 
temp.drop(index=temp[temp['Country name'] == 'North Cyprus'].index, inplace=True) 


temp['iso_alpha'] = temp['Country name'].apply(lambda x:pc.country_name_to_country_alpha3(x,))
fig = px.choropleth(temp, locations='iso_alpha',
                    color='Ladder score',
                    hover_name='Country name',
                    color_continuous_scale=px.colors.diverging.RdYlGn,
                   )
fig.update_layout(
    title_text='World map - Ladder score',
    showlegend=False,
    paper_bgcolor='rgb(248, 248, 255)',
    geo_bgcolor='rgb(248, 248, 255)',
    geo_showframe=False,
    title_font_size=22,
)
fig.show()

source.ca57e6e8: **Among asian countries, India ranks 2nd last in Social support scores. In a world context, India ranks 141th**
source.da82d227: **There's a slight increasing trend, but there are distincts drops as seen in years 2008, 2012, 2015 and 2019. With an all time low in year 2012.There are certain peaks with regards to India's Freedom to make life choices as seen in the years 2011, 2014, 2017 and 2020.**
source.529995cc: **Among asian countries, India ranks 7st in Freedom to make life choices scores. In a world context, India ranks 31st.**
source.6f4178db: **Among asian countries, India ranks 2nd last in the happiness index. In a world context, India ranks 139th, far below average.**
source.cbfbe0e8: **Among neighbouring countries, India ranks 4th in the Healthy life expectancy.**
source.4dbbdc97: **Among asian countries, India ranks 11th in Perceptions of corruption scores. In a world context, India ranks 78th.**
source.693037ed: **There are some distinct lows in 2007, 2012 and 2019, 2012 being the lowest and some distinct highs in 2008, 2014 and 2018. India's social support is on a decreasing trend over the years.**
source.e1a64888: **India's GDP is on an increasing trend over the years, with the exception of 2020.**
source.b84f46e5: **Among asian countries, India ranks 5th from the last in Healthy life expectancy scores. In a world context, India ranks 103th.**
source.4fe1e234: **Among asian countries, India ranks 16th in Log GDP per Capita scores. In a world context, India ranks 106th.**
source.2c9cc38e: **Among neighbouring countries, India ranks 2nd in the GDP per capita.**
source.9050f4d0:
# **Introduction**

**In this notebook i'm ony trying to visualize and compare the Ladder score and its score components on India in Asia and its surrounding neighbors. In this notebook I did not analyze the causes of the score in detail.**
source.523b5590: **Among neighbouring countries, India ranks 2nd last in the Ladder score.**
source.b2f2f708: **Among neighbouring countries, India ranks 2nd in the Social support.**
source.289fb50f: **Generosity amongst Indians have increased over time, with spikes in 2010, 2013, 2016 and 2019 and an all time low in 2008**
source.ef160191: **There were peaks in 2011, 2014 and 2018, and the perception of corruption has decreased over the years.**
source.20ef3a30: **Among neighbouring countries, India ranks 4nd in Generosity.**
source.74a13b4d: **Among neighbouring countries, India ranks 2nd in the Freedom to make life choices.**
source.62f3a9f2: **There are certain peaks with regards to India's ladder score as seen in the years 2008, 2010, 2012 and 2020. There are also certain drops as seen in the years 2007, 2009, 2011 and an overall low in 2019. A continouse decrease can be seen from 2012 to 2019. The overall trend for the ladder score is decreasing.**
